p: We examined the relationship between reported cases of DENV importation in China and airline travel from dengue endemic countries across SEA into China from 2005 to 2015 by using Spearmanâ€™s rank correlation coefficient. The wavelet analysis was conducted to characterize the periodicity of dengue transmission and the coherency of seasonal patterns between SEA and China, based on the methods described by van Panhuis et al (Materials and Methods in S1 Appendix) [ 40].
